title: Who is this workshop for ?
content: Each workshop is intended for different audiences. The workshops hosted in the summer of 2022 are intended mostly for first year electrical engineering students(class of 2T5). The last Machine Learning workshop was a successful attempt at extending the workshop to second year engineering students (class of 2T4).

title: When will this workshop take place?
content: Our series of workshops will take place over the summer of each school year. The focus of this series is to encourage students to review and explore essential ECE related skills over the summer driven by their own interest. If found suitable, we may also create series within the school year and broaden the topics that our workshop offers. If you have any suggestions, feel free to contact us through our email or instagram!

title: How to get updates on any new workshop?
content: You can join our mailing list by sending a request to our contact email or follow our instagram page. All information related to the workshop will be posted there, stay tuned as there may be pop ups throughout the school year!

title: What does a workshop look like?
content: If you think this workshop may sound like something that you’ll be interested in, you’re always welcomed to just come in and check it out! Usually a workshop is hosted by two presenters who are students from upper grades that excel at their areas, each workshop will have a group of 20 ~ 30 participants, and sometimes a professor who occasionally drops in and helps participants out.

title: What can I get from the workshops?
content: We hope to develop an atmosphere where students can take their time to explore the topic and feel comfortable to communicate with instructors and professors. We hope to continue this summer series and spark enthusiasm for engineering from more students.

title: What are you working on right now?
content: We are expecting to further our workshop series and extend our audiences to individuals from different years and with more diverse focus. Stay tuned for future events and workshops, we are sure there will be a workshop that seems interesting to you for sure!
